feed.title: Tetsa River (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
